info.title: Hamsa API
info.description: Trying out our transcription and media-to-text APIs

get.summary: Get a project by API key

post.description: Generates AI content based on the specified transcription job ID and parameters.

aiParts.description: The AI parts to generate content for. AI parts array should have at least one AI part object, with an aiPart (title), the language to return the content for the part in, and the prompt to use.

aiPart.description: The AI part title for the content. The AI part title must be unique for the job.

language.description: The language to return the content for the part in. The language must be one either 'ar' or 'en'.

prompt.description: The prompt to use for generating the content of the AI part. Please make sure to use descriptive and appropriate instructions here to get the best content possible.

webhookAuth.description: Authorization header to be sent in this format: `Authorization: [authKey] [authSecret]`

get.description: Returns the estimated cost for the specified AI content job.

post.description: Create a new voice agent to start using our powerful and robust voice assistant feature. This route requires an API key for authentication.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of voice agents
Retrieve a specific voice agent by ID
Retrieve a specific voice agent by ID
get.description: Use this route to get the voice agent templates created by our experts. You can take the template id and use clone voice agent route to create a new voice agent based on the template.

post.summary: Initiate a call with a voice agent

post.description: Use this route to clone an existing agent. You can use it to clone one of the voice agents templates created by our experts!

post.summary: Initiate a text to speech job
Generates an audio file from a text string (not streamed).
Generates a streamed audio file from a text string.
post.description: From the user's perspective, this is a standard request. In the response, we include specific headers: 'Transfer-Encoding' is set to 'chunked' to enable streaming, 'Connection' is set to 'keep-alive' to maintain the connection, and 'Content-Type' is set to 'audio/wav' to indicate the media type. These headers allow the client to stream audio data from the server in real time.

Transfer-Encoding.description: Indicates that the response uses chunked transfer encoding - streamed.

Connection.description: Indicates that the server will keep the connection open for streaming.

x-codeSamples.label: Stream and play audio chunks

post.summary: Generates an speech to text transcription (not streamed).

text.description: The generated text of the speech audio list.

post.summary: Add Twilio phone number to a user.
Assign Twilio phone number to a Voice Agent.

get.summary: Return a list of Twilio phone numbers for a user.

schema.description: Optional UUID of the voice agent to filter associated Twilio numbers.
Optional boolean-like string indicating whether to fetch active Twilio numbers. Defaults to 'true'.
Page number for pagination. Defaults to '1'.
Number of items to take for pagination. Defaults to '10'.

post.summary: Call Voice Agent using Twilio custom phone number.

voiceId.description: The voice id taken from the paly ground TTS voice dropdown component on the dashboard

text.example: Minimum 5 words text to speech content!
text.description: The text you want to convert to speech. Minimum 5 words text to speech content!

webhookUrl.description: The webhook url to which the TTS job result will be sent.

ExternalWebhookAuthScheme.description: Authorization header to be sent in this format: `Authorization: [authKey] [authSecret]`

srtOptions.description: You can override srtOptions default values and send the object only if returnSrtFormat is false.

greetingMessage.description: Greeting Message can be customized by adding params like: {{name}}, to make the message more personal!
greetingMessage.default: Hello, how can I help you today?

preamble.description: Preamble can be customized by adding params like: {{agentName}}, to make the prompt more specific and context aware!
preamble.default: You are a helpful assistant that will answer users questions.

pokeMessages.description: The messages to say to the user when he doesn't respond!

silenceThreshold.description: The silence threshold in milliseconds. Minimum value is 1 millisecond.

outcome.description: A prompt to take the conversation and transform it to anything you like, like creating an article out of the conversation!

outcomeResponseShape.title: Outcome Response Schema
outcomeResponseShape.description: Recursive OpenAPI-style shape with 'type', 'properties', 'required', 'items', ...etc. Please refer to the `OpenAPI Outcome Response Instructions` above for more information.

voiceId.description: You can find predefined voices in the voice agents dashboard, under the language tab

params.description: Set the params you define in the greeting message or preamble fields here, the key is the same as the param and the value is the param value. Press 'Add new property' below to set the param name then press enter, after that add the value.

voiceRecord.description: The voice record object which is connected to this agent.

params.description: The parameters that are created for this agent.

greetingMessage.description: Greeting Message can be customized by adding params like: {{name}}, to make the message more personal!

preamble.description: Preamble can be customized by adding params like: {{agentName}}, to make the prompt more specific and context aware!

pokeMessages.description: The messages to say to the user when he doesn't respond!

outcome.description: A prompt to take the conversation and transform it to anything you like, like creating an article out of the conversation!

outcomeResponseShape.title: Outcome Response Schema
outcomeResponseShape.description: Recursive OpenAPI-style shape with 'type', 'properties', 'required', 'items', ...etc. Please refer to the `OpenAPI Outcome Response Instructions` above for more information.

voiceId.description: You can find predefined voices in the voice agents dashboard, under the language tab

params.description: Set the params you define in the greeting message or preamble fields here, the key is the same as the param and the value is the param value. Press 'Add new property' below to set the param name then press enter, after that add the value.

toNumber.description: The number that you want to call

agentDetails.description: Send agentDetails instead of voiceAgentId and params.

params.description: Params set in the voice agent's greeting message or preamble. Send when using voiceAgentId only.

text.description: The text to be generated as an aduio file.

speaker.description: The speaker name, this field's value can be taken from the dashboard voice agents section.

dialect.description: The dialect of each country by its country code. Recommended voices per dialect are: pls (Palestinian): Amjad, Layan, Talin, Rema, Ali; leb (Lebanese): Carla, Majd; jor (Jordanian): Lana, Jasem, Nada; syr (Syrian): Dalal, Mais; ksa (Saudi): Hiba, Khadija, Fahd, Jasem; bah (Bahraini): Mazen; uae (Emirati): Salma, Dima; egy (Egyptian): Mariam, Samir, Nada, Ali, Ahmed; irq (Iraqi): Lyali, Fatma.

mulaw.description: Whether to use 'Mu-Law' algorithm in voice signal processing or not.

audioList.description: The audio list that contains the audio data as numbers of type float. Audio data should be of type WAV. You can not send this field and audioBase64 together!

items.description: Float numbers which represents the audio data.

audioBase64.description: The audio base64 string that contains the audio data. Audio data should be of type WAV. You can not send this field and audioList together!

isEosEnabled.description: Whether to enable End of Speech detection or not.

eosThreshold.description: The threshold value for End of Speech detection.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number to add to the Twilio numbers of a user.

label.description: A label to identify the phone number.

twilioNumberSid.description: The Twilio Number SID associated with the phone number.

twilioAccountSid.description: The Twilio Account SID associated with the Twilio number.

twilioAuthToken.description: The Twilio Auth Token for authenticating API requests.

toNumber.description: The number that you want to call

agentDetails.description: Send agentDetails instead of voiceAgentId and params.

params.description: Params set in the voice agent's greeting message or preamble. Send when using voiceAgentId only.

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: Pass the API key in the Authorization header, You need to put Token keyword before the API key. e.g. 'Authorization: Token <api-key>'
